sentences.en: A complexion that had been pastelike was now chalky white.
sentences.cn: 曾经像浆糊一样的面容现在像白垩一样白.

sentences.en: Each animal has a chalky skeleton.
sentences.cn: 每个珊瑚虫有灰质的骨骼.

sentences.en: Eurasian thistle growing in sand dunes and dry chalky soils.
sentences.cn: 在沙丘或干旱白垩土壤中生长的欧亚蓟.

sentences.en: Her face became a chalky white.
Incorporating organic material into chalky soils will reduce the alkalinity.
sentences.cn: 在白垩质土壤中添加有机物可降低其碱性。

sentences.en: It was sealed by a wall and contained chalky soil to the depth of one metre.
sentences.cn: 它被一堵墙密封著,仿如白垩时期的泥土深达一公尺.

sentences.en: Shallow burial seems to preserve chalky textured porosity.
sentences.cn: 浅埋藏似能保留具白垩状结构的孔隙.

sentences.en: Soil in the Champagne region is either chalky or a clay - chalk mixture.
sentences.cn: 香槟区的土壤为白垩土或陶土和白垩土混合两种.

sentences.en: The chalky soil around Saumur produces the famous Anjou wines.
sentences.cn: 索米尔周围的白垩质土壤出产著名的安茹葡萄酒。

sentences.en: The cotyledons of the mature embryo are either green, yellow or chalky yellow.
sentences.cn: 成熟胚的子叶是绿色, 黄色或浅黄色.

sentences.en: The light outside had chilled, and threw a chalky whiteness on the river.
sentences.cn: 外面的光线暗了下来, 在河上投上一层石灰白.

sentences.en: There were chalky bits in the bottom of the drink.
sentences.cn: 饮料底层有粉笔灰一样的东西。

sentences.en: Use it to clean chalky holds before and after you climb.
sentences.cn: 下个要爬的人会为此而感谢你的.

sentences.en: What did she see when she looked at the strange, chalky - skinned family that was universally avoided?
sentences.cn: 当她看到这群奇怪的, 有着苍白皮肤,被所有人避嫌的家族后,会有什么感想?

sentences.en: When over applied, white, chalky deposits may appear after drying.
sentences.cn: 过度喷涂时, 干燥后会产生白色残留物.

words.tran_cn: 粉笔；白垩；用粉笔划的记号
[病理] 痛风石；[病理] 白垩块
用粉笔写；用白垩粉擦；记录；规划
白垩状的,易粉碎的,粉状的

trans.tran_en: similar to chalk or containing chalk
